description:
It's time that we start praising Snaps, Flatpaks and Appimages.  These package formats are great alternatives to have, and in some cases, installing programs as these package formats is an improvement over your Linux distro's native package for that app.

title: For Some Apps, It's BETTER To Install The Snap or Flatpak
